name: Viber Casino
description:
Play in our Viber Casino with millions of players worldwide!

Viber Casino includes 3 of the most popular Casino games.
- Texas Hold'em Poker
- Blackjack
- Roulette

Join a world of entertainment and fun, prove that you're a real champion!

Game features:
* YOUR OWN PROFILE PAGE, hosting all your progress and status in the game! Win tournaments, get achievements and buy new property to own the game.
* FREE CHIPS – Come back to the game every day and get free chips.
* TOURNAMENTS – Participate in Weekly Tournaments, Sit'n'Go and Shootout tournaments and master your skills. Win unique trophies and climb the leaderboard.
* 3 VERSIONS OF ROULETTE – Try European, French and American roulettes and choose the best for you.
* 3D GRAPHICS – An absolutely free blackjack game with stunningly realistic 3D graphics.
* CHAT WITH OTHER PLAYERS – Use the convenient chat and message system to discuss hands you've won and get even more fun out of the game.
* GET REWARDS – Up the stakes, win hands, go all-in and unlock achievements.
* SMOOTH INTERFACE – A simple and attractive interface which gives you the ability to call, fold or raise the stakes with just one tap.
* FAIR HAND DEALING GUARANTEED! Certified Random Number Generator (RNG) to bring you the best and fairest game experience.
